name: My Life for Yours
story_text: You channel some of your vitality into more resilience for you or an ally.
trigger_text: The target starts their turn or takes damage.
effect:
You spend a Recovery and the target regains Stamina equal to your recovery value.

You can end one effect on the target that is ended by a saving throw or that ends at the end of their turn, or a prone target can stand up.
